.
Laiyang is located in the middle of ShanDong Peninsula. It is bordered with Haiyang on the east, Laixi on the west, Qixia and Zhaoyuan on the north and Jimo on the south.
Airport is located in nearby city of Yantai. Access by sea is also available to city of Yantai. Only about two hours drive from Yantai will bring you to the city of Laiyang. Train is another choice.
Get around by car is the most effective and efficient way in Laiyang. Ideally a four wheel drive.

Laiyang Chi Pear, which is generally called liayang pear, is one of the traditional rare species of Shandong pears. Laiyang Pear Flowers, due to its large number of pear trees, Laiyang city is refered to as the "City of pears".
Tour around the city, enjoy the cheap but quality food. Try Laiyang Chi Pear, and look at modern development of the city.
Fresh fruit is a good buy. Cheap but so juicy and nice!!!
Shandong cuisine is famous in China. And is well-known in Korea and Japan.
Local beers is a good choice.
Five hotels are located in the city. These are Laiyang hotel, Laiyang Lidu hotel, Laiyang Communication Hotel, and Laiyang Huitong Hotel.
Travel back to Yantai for flight.
